text: Wild Hogs is a 2007 American road comedy movie directed by Walt Becker and starring Tim Allen, John Travolta, Martin Lawrence, William H. Macy, Marisa Tomei. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. == Other websites == * * Category:2007 comedy movies Category:2000s road movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American road movies Category:Comedy road movies Category:Movies directed by Walt Becker
title: Wild Hogs
